caption: Several boys were doing woodworking in a room. A car pulled up at the front of a house with a swimming pool, where many people were swimming. Two boys arrived at the pool, and one of them sat on a beach chair. He noticed a few girls and removed his towel to walk towards the pool. The boy waved to the girls in the pool. Suddenly, an uncle rushed into the pool and pulled the boy out, performing CPR on him. In red clothing, the boy bid farewell to his parents and got into a car, leaving. They arrived at a house, where they played games in front of the door.
